data.comment: The match is underway in London.
At Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium, Yoann Barbet has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Stoke kick-off.
Niko Hamalainen (QPR) has received a yellow card from Keith Stroud.
In the minute 57, QPR make their first substitution with Chris Willock replacing Albert Adomah.
Mark Warburton (QPR) is making a second substitution, with Dominic Ball replacing Tom Carroll.
Steven Fletcher is replacing Jacob Brown for the away team.
In the minute 77, The home team have replaced Lyndon Dykes with Macauley Bonne. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
Jordan Thompson is replacing Josh Tymon for Stoke at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
Michael O'Neill is making the team's third substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Thibaud Verlinden replacing James McClean.
In the minute 83, Michael O'Neill (Stoke) has taken off Nick Powell who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Tashan Oakley-Boothe is the replacement.
Stoke's Harry Souttar has been booked in London.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
